aggregate_id.description: ID of the entity (aggregate) that this event relates to

aggregate_type.description: Type of the aggregate, e.g., 'plugin', 'user', etc.

version.description: Version of the aggregate's state after this event

source.description: Origin or source of the event, typically the service name

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp for when the event occurred

payload.description: Data related to the event, this varies depending on event type

user_id.description: ID of the user initiating the event
